summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Jones Avenue Northwest and 23rd Avenue Northwest, each from West 65th Street to West 75th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8413 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
